flawed_nl_solution:
He had 80-20=<<80-20=60>>60 after the donation
He kept 60/2=<<60/2=30>>30 after giving half to his brother
So he has 30*3=<<30*3=90>>90 coins
He then does 1 more donation and has 90-10=<<90-10=84>>84 coins left
#### 84

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 80, not 84. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
